name: Wolfenstein Revenge
description: Based on Wolfenstein 3D from id software, the project begins in the first year of highschool. Fight the enemies and find the exit to reach the next level. You will find some objects that may be useful: medikit and food to restore your health, weapons and ammo to fight, gold to increase your score, keys to open doors. Note: you have only 4 weapon slots; if you try to get a weapon and you have all slots full, it will be exchanged with the one in use.
